sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词均有"连接，结合，联合"之意。
sameAnalysis.word_list: join, combine, unite, connect, link, attach, couple, associate, relate
means: join ： 侧重把原来不相连接的物紧密地连接在一起，但仍可再分开。也指把分散的人或几个部分的人联合起来，或加入到某团体中去。
combine ： 指两个或两个以上的人或物结合在一起。
unite ： 指联合、团结、结合在一起，构成一个整体。
connect ： 指两事物在某一点上相连接，但彼此又保持独立。
link ： 指连环式的连接，或用接合物或其它方式连接，还可指一事物与另一事物的联系或关系。
attach ： 指把局部连接在整体上，小的接在大的上面，活动的接在固定的上面。
couple ： 专指连接两件东西，或把事物成对进行连接。
associate ： 指人与人友好和平、平等地联合在一起；用于物时，指两事物因历史或其它原因，很自然被人们联系在一起，即产生联想。
relate ： 指人与人有亲戚或婚烟关系；也指人或物之间尚存的实际或假想的联系。

word_mean: 两点之间具有规定性能的电信设施。链路通常以传输通道类型或容量来区分，例如：无线电链路、同轴链路、宽频带链路。

sentence.Network_en: He suggested a link between class size and test results of seven-year-olds.
sentence.Network_cn: 他认为7岁大的学生的测试分数和班级的规模有关系。

sentence.Network_en: Something must have gone wrong with the satellite link.
sentence.Network_cn: 卫星连接一定出了毛病。

sentence.Network_en: There's a good British Rail link at Clapham Junction.
sentence.Network_cn: 在克拉珀姆枢纽站有条很不错的英国铁路线。

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English (denoting a loop; also as a verb in the sense 'connect physically'): from Old Norse hlekkr, of Germanic origin; related to German Gelenk 'joint'
early 16th cent.: perhaps from medieval Latin li(n)chinus 'wick', from Greek lukhnos 'light'

encyclopedia.content: 简介 Link是动画《机巧魔神》第一季的片尾主题曲（ED），由angela组合创作并演唱。 Link - angela 作词：atsuko 作曲：atsuko・katsu 所属专辑：spiral&link (tvアニメ アスラクライン op&ed) 歌词 やがて空は 暗に覆われて yagate sora wa yami ni oowa rete けれど私は あなたを见つける keredo watashi wa anatawo mitsu keru 苦悩と歓喜の狭间に生きてる kunou to kanki no hazama ni iki teru 逞しくあれ

entry.def: If there is a link between two things or situations, there is a relationship between them, for example because one thing causes or affects the other.

example.ex: ...the link between smoking and lung cancer.
example.tran: 吸烟与胃癌之间的关联

entry.tran: 使联系在一起；使相关联
entry.def: If someone or something links two things or situations, there is a relationship between them, for example because one thing causes or affects the other.

example.ex: The UN Security Council has linked any lifting of sanctions to compliance with the ceasefire terms...
example.tran: 联合国安全理事会将取消制裁与遵守停火协议挂钩。

example.ex: The study further strengthens the evidence linking smoking with early death...
example.tran: 这项研究进一步证实了吸烟与早逝之间的联系。

entry.def: A link between two things or places is a physical connection between them.

example.ex: ...the high-speed rail link between London and the Channel Tunnel...
example.tran: 伦敦与海峡隧道间的高速铁路连接线

example.ex: The new road schemes include a link between Chelmsford and the M25...
example.tran: 新的道路规划中包括了一条切姆斯福德与M25号高速公路的连接线。

entry.def: If two places or objects are linked or something links them, there  is a physical connection between them.

example.ex: ...the Rama Road, which links the capital, Managua, with the Caribbean coast...
example.tran: 连接首都马那瓜和加勒比海岸的拉马路

example.ex: The campus is linked by regular bus services to Coventry.
example.tran: 校园与考文垂之间由班车连接起来。

entry.tran: （友好的或商业上的）联系，关系
entry.def: A link between two people, organizations, or places is a friendly or business connection between them.

example.ex: Kiev hopes to cement close links with Bonn...
example.tran: 基辅希望能加强与波恩的密切关系。

example.ex: In 1984 the long link between AC Cars and the Hurlock family was severed...
example.tran: 1984年，AC汽车公司与赫洛克家族长久以来的关系破裂了。

entry.def: A link to another person or organization is something that allows you to communicate with them or have contact with them.

example.ex: She was my only link with the past...
example.tran: 她是我与过去的唯一纽带。

example.ex: The Red Cross was created to provide a link between soldiers in battle and their families at home...
example.tran: 红十字会是作为前线士兵和后方家人的一种联系方式而创立起来的。

entry.def: If you link one person or thing to  another, you claim that there is a relationship or connection between them.

example.ex: Criminologist Dr Ann Jones has linked the crime to social circumstances...
example.tran: 犯罪学家安·琼斯博士认为这起罪案与社会环境有关。

example.ex: They've linked her with various men, including magnate Donald Trump.
example.tran: 他们把她与不同的男人扯上关系，包括大亨唐纳德·特朗普。

entry.def: In computing, a link is a connection between different documents, or between different parts of the same document, using hypertext.
A link is one of the rings in a chain.
If you link one thing with another, you join them by putting one thing through the other.

example.ex: She linked her arm through his...
He linked the fingers of his hands together on his stomach.
example.tran: 他双手十指交叉放在腹部。

means.word_mean: 1. the means of connection between things linked in series
2. a fastener that serves to join or link;

sentences.sentence: "the walls are held together with metal links placed in the wet mortar during construction"
"the connection between church and state is inescapable"

means.word_mean: 5. a unit of length equal to 1/100 of a chain
6. (computing) an instruction that connects one part of a program or an element on a list to another program or list
7. a channel for communication between groups;

sentences.sentence: "he provided a liaison with the guerrillas"

means.word_mean: 8. a two-way radio communication system (usually microwave); part of a more extensive telecommunication network
9. an interconnecting circuit between two or more locations for the purpose of transmitting and receiving data
1. make a logical or causal connection;

sentences.sentence: "I cannot connect these two pieces of evidence in my mind"
"I cannot relate these events at all"

means.word_mean: 2. connect, fasten, or put together two or more pieces;
3. be or become joined or united or linked;

sentences.sentence: "The two streets connect to become a highway"
"The travelers linked up again at the airport"

means.word_mean: 4. link with or as with a yoke;

auth_sentence.res_content: But other experts still disagree that a link exists.

Sentence.sentence: You'll also be able to receive email, music and movies, all via an internet link.
Moving on to communications, very soon, cars will be linked to GPS satellites, so they'll do all the driving for you.
So there used to be transport problems, now though there are new train links and better roads, but it may be that some smaller towns inland remain not very well connected, is that OK?
Their road link to other European countries is fast
Take advantage of the train links
Road and rail links for small towns

means.word_mean: 连接, 联系，把（物体、机器、地方等）连接起来

sentences.en: The road links all the new towns.
sentences.cn: 这条路把所有的新市镇连接在一起。

sentences.en: Each link that makes up a chain is equally important.
sentences.cn: 链子上面的每一环都同等重要, 缺一不可。

means.word_mean: 用环连接；串联；连接；联系；联系着 (常与 up 或 together 连用)

sentences.en: The new firm linked up with several big ones.
sentences.cn: 这家新公司和几家大公司联合起来了。

jushi.english: The road links all the new towns.
jushi.chinese: 这条路把所有的新市镇连接在一起。

jushi.english: The police suspect that the two crimes may be linked.
jushi.chinese: 警方怀疑这两起案件可能有关联。
